a. Audit & Assurance We provide quality audit and assurance services to our clients through expertise and experience of our audit teams. We maintain close communication with our clients to drive value from our services while maintaining regular and close interaction with management and audit committee to ensure that key objectives of the business are achieved. We apply modern technology, knowledge-based applications and in depth understanding of the audit process to deliver quality audits. We apply risk-based methodology in our financial audits and leverage on our professional and industry experience to deliver in our assignments.

b. Tax Planning & Preparation We provide our clients with tax planning, preparation and compliance services to individuals, partnerships, pension schemes, religious organisations, Saccos and corporate businesses. We provide monthly VAT returns and annual filings to our clients and handle any matter related to tax. Visit our tax page, corporate and individual tax planning for more information.

c. Advisory i. Management Consultancy People & Resources For organisations to reduce costs, build stakeholder confidence and focus on its strategy while gaining competitive advantage through its staff, it must attract and maintain the right quality of staff with right skills and commitment to organization’s goals and objectives.

As Jim Collins puts it, “Great vision without great people is irrelevant”, Maribel-Hermans believes in engaging great staff with great attitude with the desire to solve complex business challenges and optimizing on opportunities that arise to enable the organisation to succeed. The desired skills, mindset, behavioral and cultural change drives true transformation in organisations.

We partner with organisations to enrich their capacity through: • Training and Development • Designing and review of organisation structures • Executive selection and recruitment of staff

ii. Ethics Management & Governance “Real integrity is doing the right thing, knowing that nobody’s going to know whether you did it or not.” Oprah Winfrey We partner with clients to help them put in place value system through development of codes of ethics and conduct which nurture the people and organizational culture. We provide our services through keeping our promise by caring, respecting and being fair in our judgment. We offer the following services to our esteemed clients. • Ethics training & management • Helping clients to establish value driven codes of ethics and conduct • Developing guidelines and policies for vetting potential and existing employees • Developing governance policies blended with global best practices • Providing support for individuals facing ethical dilemmas

iii. Business Planning & Management Our desire is to enable businesses to achieve stable and sustainable strategic objectives. We help businesses develop and review strategic plans, business plans. We provide solutions to business management challenges. In addition, we review and strengthen financial management system to reduce operating costs to enhance profitability, growth and drive the business into excellence.

iv. Risk Management Consultancy Accountancy & Book-keeping Maribel-Hermans is strategically placed and driven by commitment and excellence to lower your non-core business costs. We partner with clients to achieve this through offering the following services: • Booking keeping & financial accounting • Payroll processing • Business process outsourcing • Preparation of management accounts • Business and internal control reviews • Preparation of financial statements

Internal Audit Services An internal audit service is critical to addressing governance, risk control and compliance challenges in businesses and organisation. We offer quality internal audit services to clients to reduce the employment costs while getting value addition services. We conduct quality assurance reviews to internal audit functions and advice the management and those in charge of governance accordingly.

Enterprise Risk Management Enterprise risk management is critical for any business to succeed in implementing its strategies to achieve its strategic objectives. We leverage on expertise to provide quality risk management services to our clients. We achieve this by offering the following services: • Developing ERM frameworks • Developing risk management policies • Risk management training • Conducting risk assessments and reporting framework

IT Audits Information Technology is a business enabler and driver. Businesses need to have modern technologies and resilient IT infrastructure and systems to support business strategies. We conduct IT audits and reviews to provide assurance on their effectiveness and efficiencies.

Investigations, Forensic Audits & Fraud Management We offer specialized investigations and fraud management systems to reduce fraudulent malpractices in business including forensic audit services. We provide secure whistle blowing services in order to encourage and protect staff and any other stakeholder who may wish to provide information on unethical behavior, bribery and corruption.

Procurement Reviews & Audits We partner with business to review their procurement processes and regular audits to ensure compliance with relevant laws, procedures and policies of individual organisation. We achieve this through: • Providing procurement training for staff • Developing procurement policies • Regular review of procurement activities for periods in the business

Corporate Finance We provide advisory to business on how raise funds to finance and achieve their operation and investment strategies while gaining optimal financing solution.

v. Environmental Consulting Environmental Impact Assessment Individuals and businesses implement projects which require compliance with environmental laws. Maribel-Hermans provide Environmental Impact Assessment environmental solutions to our clients involved in project development both at individual and business levels in compliance with Environmental Management and Coordination Act (EMCA), 1999. Out team expertise are at the disposal of clients with requisite tools to undertake environmental impact assessment while developing sustainable environmental management plans to mitigate against environmental risks the projects might be exposed to.

Strategic Environmental and Social Assessment Organization periodic development plans including strategic and spatial plans. The strategic goals and objectives must be incorporated with sustainable development goals where environmental considerations are included. Maribel-Hermans are privileged to be endowed with knowledge, skills and expertise on strategic environmental and social assessment which is critical in the planning process. We provide workable and lasting solutions that embed strategic with environmental goals.

Environmental Audits and Monitoring Environmental scanning and assessment is critical for organisations and individual investors. Our dedicated team leverage on the experience, expertise, skills and knowledge of various industries to help organisations to assess their environmental conditions. Maribel-Hermans provide high quality environmental risk-based assessments, audits while developing environmental management plans in compliance with EMCA Act, 1999 and advising businesses on the need to maintain sustainable environmental practices. In addition, we partner with clients in the implementation of environmental management systems conducive to working conditions.

Health & Safety Services Health and safety is critical in the operation and management of organizations. Good, healthy and safe working environment is good for businesses, employees and service providers and it can boost productivity and limit damages and claims that may arise from incidents. This leads to low operating costs while maintaining and attracting new business opportunities. Organisations have moral obligations to provide healthy and safe working environment, and in compliance with the Occupational Safety and Health Act (OSHA), 2007. Maribel-Hermans offer solutions through the following services. • Health and Safety audits • Developing of safety policies • Safety inspection of development sites

We further review condition and work environment to minimize workplace incidents that may increase occupational risk resulting to increased cost to the businesses.

Data Science Services Data science helps organisations investigate their data in search of business comprehension. We help organisations optimize on data analytics and insights for business strategies. We assist in analysis of data to provide business apprehension through Big Data technologies. Data Protection & Privacy Data protection is critical in the wake of various legislations across jurisdictions in the world. In compliance with Data Protection Act 2019, we provide training and awareness sessions to organisations for the need of compliance with the Act and other related data protection laws across the world. We further, assist organisations develop data protection policies which are compliant with the Data Protection Act 2019, General Data Protection Regulations (GDPR), UK Data Protection Law and any other data protection laws that could affect operations of the businesses.

We commit and deliver. Give us the opportunity and you wait for returns.
